import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Grid, Form, Button, FormField, Accordion, FormCheckbox, GridColumn, Input, Modal, Image, Segment } from 'semantic-ui-react'; function AccountSettingsForm({ handleGetUserMe, handleUpdateUser, handleToggleUserEmail, currentPassword, newPassword, handlePasswordChange, handlePasswordApply, modalOpen, setModalOpen }) { const userImage = 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg'; const userInfo = { fullName: ``, email: 'email@gmail.com', phoneNumber: '+79876543210', role: 'Актер', }; const panels = [ { key: 'privacy', title: 'Настройки приватности', content: { content: (
setModalOpen(true)}>Изменение пароля
), }, }, ]; return ( <>

ФИО: {userInfo.fullName}

Email: {userInfo.email}

Уведомления: Включены

setModalOpen(false)} onOpen={() => modalOpen(true)} open={modalOpen} > Изменение пароля
